Compared to deathless acolytes, deathless hierophants are often much more ambitious and far-reaching, with goals like seeking an entire nation's conversion to the worship of their deity. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 25 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20 [Deathless Hierophant of Urgathoa](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1854) **Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 88 **Perception** +15; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +15, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +12, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +19, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13 **Str** +2 **Dex** +4 **Con** +0 **Int** +1 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +4 **Items** _+1 [scythe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39)_, [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Urgathoa](/Deities.aspx?ID=19) --- **AC** 23 **Fort** +13 **Ref** +13 **Will** +17 **HP** 87 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Field of Undeath** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) 40 feet. Allies within the aura who have [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42) gain [fast healing 4](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15). When a creature within the aura would receive [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), it must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or receive no healing from the effect.
**Chastise Heretic** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) **Trigger** A creature within 60 feet who the deathless hierophant can see and who doesn't worship [Urgathoa](/Deities.aspx?ID=19) casts a divine spell; **Effect** The deathless hierophant attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the triggering spell using their spell attack modifier and a counteract level of 4. If the spell is counteracted, the caster takes 1d10 persistent negative damage. If the deathless hierophant fails to counteract the spell, the caster is temporarily immune to further uses of this ability for 24 hours. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _scythe_ +15 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 1d10+8 slashing **Cleric Domain Spells** 2 Focus Points, DC 25 - **4th** [Malignant Sustenance](/Spells.aspx?ID=432), [Touch of Undeath](/Spells.aspx?ID=461) **Divine Prepared Spells** DC 25, attack +17 - **1st** [Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Goblin Pox](/Spells.aspx?ID=139) - **2nd** [False Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=108), [Ghoulish Cravings](/Spells.aspx?ID=134), [Spiritual Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=306) - **3rd** [Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) (x2) - **4th** [Anathematic Reprisal](/Spells.aspx?ID=9), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (x5), [Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
